Commands.Whirling Edge: Increases BRV based on MAX BRV, then group HP attack  Deals proportionate HP damage to each target  All Targets: 2 turns SPD Down I
Commands.Sensual Dance: All Targets: 2 turns ATK Down I, MAG ATK Down I  Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
Commands.Rousing Samba & Dancer's Fury: Raises party BRV based on Max BRV  Grants 「Rousing Samba」 for 6 turns  Triggers 「Dancer's Fury」:  - 3-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  - BRV stolen can overflow up to 150%   「Rousing Samba」 has the following effects:  - Raises self Max BRV  - Raises party Critical hit rate  - Raises party Max BRV overflow limit

Passives.Whirling Edge BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Whirling Edge.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Sensual Dance Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Sensual Dance.
Passives.Debuff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Whirling Edge Charge: Increases the max uses of Whirling Edge by 1.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Sensual Dance Charge: Increases the max uses of Sensual Dance by 1.
Passives.Moonlight Butterfly: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense of all party members when HP is over 50%.

Weapons.Darksteel Jambiya CP: 15: Increases the BRV gain of Whirling Edge.Increases the potency of Speed Down and extends its duration.Grants Small Speed Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Cinquedea CP: 35: Increases the potency and extends the duration (4 turns) of Attack Down and Magical Attack Down.Inflicts Sap to all targets for 4 turns.Grants Medium Max BRV Up to all party members for 6 turns.Increases the BRV given to all party members.
